trends: There have been 17 other sightings in Stuart
There were no other sightings in Stuart on or around June 23rd 2013
Summary: We saw the lights from our bedroom window at about 11:45PM
divs: Sighting DetailsI saw my wife looking out the bedroom window and questioned her about what she saw. She said there was a light in the north sky that had not moved for several seconds. I saw it and got my binoculars to get a closeup view. What I saw was 2 horizontal rows of 4 lights each. They were like :::: I also noticed what looked like a reflection off shiny metal around the lights. I handed the binoculars to her and she could not find the light. While I was trying to help her find it, I looked away for a few seconds. When I looked back, it was gone. She said she saw a blue flash near the ground and then the light was suddenly in the SE sky. Then it disappeared. I was excited to see what I believe was a UFO because I have been a believer for many years. My wife has always been skeptical and she was quite shaken about what she saw. I think her attitude may have changed. I forgot to mention that when my wife first saw the lights with her naked eye she saw a different light pattern. :: :: I hope you get the idea. . . . The lights were closer together, but this is the general pattern.
